      • rotatePoint

        public static com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 rotatePoint(float cx,
                                                        float cy,
                                                        float angle,
                                                        com.badlogic.gdx.math.Vector2 p)
        Rotate a point p around pivot point (cx,cy)
        Parameters:
        cx - x of the pivot point
        cy - y of the pivot point
        angle - the angle which the point must be rotated according to
        p - the point to be rotated
        Returns:
        a rotated point around (cx, cy) given point p
